20101207023429.571|20101207023431.000|CCO|LAWSUIT EVER.
20101207023431.000|20101207023432.429|CCO|HUNDREDS OF THOUSANDS OF WOMEN

20101207023439.571|20101207023441.000|CCO|EMPLOYEES.

20101207023444.333|20101207023446.000|CCO|FIRST TO SUE WHEN THIS CASE

20101207023449.333|20101207023451.000|CCO|APPLY FOR MANAGEMENT.

20101207023504.333|20101207023507.667|CCO|CLASS ACTION LAWSUIT OF AS MANY 
20101207023507.667|20101207023511.000|CCO|AS 1.5 MILLION WOMEN SUING IS

20101207023513.857|20101207023515.286|CCO|SETTLEMENT.

20101207023521.000|20101207023522.667|CCO|THOSE STORES AND MANAGERS.

20101207023532.667|20101207023534.333|CCO|CLAMS IN ONE FELL SWOOP.
20101207023534.333|20101207023536.000|CCO|>> Reporter: THE U.S. CHAMBER OF
20101207023536.000|20101207023537.667|CCO|COMMERCE HOPE THE COURT WILL USE
20101207023537.667|20101207023539.333|CCO|THE CASE TO PUT LIMITS ON CLASS 
20101207023539.333|20101207023541.000|CCO|ACTION SUITS WHICH THEY CLAIM 
20101207023541.000|20101207023542.667|CCO|HAVE BECOME ABUSIVE.

20101207023547.667|20101207023549.333|CCO|SOMETIMES THE ONLY WAY TO GET

20101207023551.000|20101207023553.000|CCO|WHEN THEY VIOLATE CIVIL RIGHTS.

20101207023555.000|20101207023557.000|CCO|LEVEL IF ONE INDIVIDUAL HAS TO 
20101207023557.000|20101207023559.000|CCO|GO UP AGAINST WALMART.
20101207023559.000|20101207023601.000|CCO|BUT IF AN ENTIRE CLASS CAN 
20101207023601.000|20101207023602.667|CCO|PROCEED AGAINST WALMART, IT 
20101207023602.667|20101207023604.333|CCO|LEVELS THE PLAYING FIELD, IT 
20101207023604.333|20101207023606.000|CCO|MAKES IT A FAIR PLAYING FIELD.

20101207023631.000|20101207023633.000|CCO|STATEMENT TONIGHT SAYING HER

20101207024439.182|20101207024440.091|CCO|
20101207024440.091|20101207024441.000|CCO|    games with my grandchildren.
20101207024441.000|20101207024442.429|CCO|           Great news!
20101207024442.429|20101207024443.857|CCO|      For people with COPD,
20101207024443.857|20101207024445.286|CCO|  including chronic bronchitis,
20101207024445.286|20101207024446.714|CCO|       emphysema, or both,
20101207024446.714|20101207024448.143|CCO|   ADVAIR helps significantly
20101207024448.143|20101207024449.571|CCO|     improve lung function.
20101207024449.571|20101207024451.000|CCO| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101207024451.000|20101207024452.000|CCO|  ADVAIR is different from most
20101207024452.000|20101207024453.000|CCO|     other COPD medications
20101207024453.000|20101207024454.000|CCO|    
20101207024454.000|20101207024455.000|CCO|          because it contains
20101207024455.000|20101207024456.000|CCO|    
20101207024456.000|20101207024457.000|CCO|    both an anti-inflammatory
20101207024457.000|20101207024458.000|CCO|        and a long-acting
20101207024458.000|20101207024459.000|CCO|         bronchodilator,
20101207024459.000|20101207024500.000|CCO|        working together
20101207024500.000|20101207024501.000|CCO|   to help you breathe better.
20101207024501.000|20101207024502.000|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101207024502.000|20101207024503.000|CCO|  inhalers for sudden symptoms
20101207024503.000|20101207024504.000|CCO|        and should not be
20101207024504.000|20101207024505.000|CCO|   used more than twice a day.
20101207024505.000|20101207024506.000|CCO| People with COPD taking ADVAIR
20101207024506.000|20101207024507.000|CCO|    may have a higher chance
20101207024507.000|20101207024508.000|CCO|          of pneumonia.
20101207024508.000|20101207024509.000|CCO|    
20101207024509.000|20101207024510.000|CCO|          ADVAIR may increase
20101207024510.000|20101207024511.000|CCO|    your risk of osteoporosis
20101207024511.000|20101207024512.429|CCO|     and some eye problems.
20101207024512.429|20101207024513.857|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101207024513.857|20101207024515.286|CCO|  if you have a heart condition
20101207024515.286|20101207024516.714|CCO|     or high blood pressure
20101207024516.714|20101207024518.143|CCO|      before taking ADVAIR.
20101207024518.143|20101207024519.571|CCO|    I had fun today, Grandpa.

20101207024559.000|20101207024601.000|CCO|GOOD MANY DOCTORS BELIEVE IT IS 
20101207024601.000|20101207024602.667|CCO|SOMETHING OF A WONDER.
20101207024602.667|20101207024604.333|CCO|MILLIONS OF PEOPLE TAKE A HALF 
20101207024604.333|20101207024606.000|CCO|ASPIRIN EVERY DAY, FOR EXAMPLE, 
20101207024606.000|20101207024607.667|CCO|FOR HEART HEALTH.
20101207024607.667|20101207024609.333|CCO|NOW COMES A NEW STUDY THAT SHOWS
20101207024609.333|20101207024611.000|CCO|ASPIRIN MAY BE MUCH MORE 
20101207024611.000|20101207024612.667|CCO|EFFECTIVE THAN ANYONE KNEW AT 
20101207024612.667|20101207024614.333|CCO|HELPING PREVENT CANCER DEATHS.
20101207024614.333|20101207024616.000|CCO|OUR REPORT TONIGHT FROM OUR 
20101207024616.000|20101207024617.667|CCO|CHIEF SCIENCE CORRESPONDENT 
20101207024617.667|20101207024619.333|CCO|ROBERT BAZELL.
20101207024619.333|20101207024621.000|CCO|>> YOU NEED TO DO THE 
20101207024621.000|20101207024622.429|CCO|PREVENTATIVE THINGS THAT YOU 
20101207024622.429|20101207024623.857|CCO|NEED TO DO FOR YOUR HEART 
20101207024623.857|20101207024625.286|CCO|HEALTH.
20101207024625.286|20101207024626.714|CCO|>> Reporter: FOR YEARS, THE ADS 
20101207024626.714|20101207024628.143|CCO|HAVE CALLED IT THE WONDER DRUG 
20101207024628.143|20101207024629.571|CCO|THAT WORKS WONDERS.
20101207024629.571|20101207024631.000|CCO|SCIENCE HAS PROVEN THAT A LOW 
20101207024631.000|20101207024633.500|CCO|DOSE ASPIRIN TABLET REDUCES THE 
20101207024633.500|20101207024636.000|CCO|RISK OF HEART DISEASE AND 
20101207024636.000|20101207024638.500|CCO|SUGGESTS IT MIGHT LOWER COLON 
20101207024638.500|20101207024641.000|CCO|CANCER RISK, AS WELL.
20101207024641.000|20101207024643.000|CCO|NOW A STUDY FROM BRITISH DOCTORS
20101207024643.000|20101207024645.000|CCO|SUGGEST IT MAY ALSO CUT DEATHS 
20101207024645.000|20101207024647.000|CCO|FOR MANY OTHER CANCERS.
20101207024647.000|20101207024649.000|CCO|>> I THINK IT'S VERY IMPORTANT.
20101207024649.000|20101207024651.000|CCO|THE COMPELLING EVIDENCE IS 
20101207024651.000|20101207024652.667|CCO|VITALLY IMPORTANT IN OUR EFFORT 
20101207024652.667|20101207024654.333|CCO|TO PREVENT THE BURDEN OF CANCER 
20101207024654.333|20101207024656.000|CCO|IN THIS COUNTRY.
20101207024656.000|20101207024657.667|CCO|>> Reporter: BRITISH RESEARCHERS
20101207024657.667|20101207024659.333|CCO|EXAMINED EIGHT STUDIES WITH A 
20101207024659.333|20101207024701.000|CCO|TOTAL OF MORE THAN 25,000 
20101207024701.000|20101207024703.500|CCO|PATIENTS.
20101207024703.500|20101207024706.000|CCO|THEY CONCLUDED THAT IN ADDITION 
20101207024706.000|20101207024708.500|CCO|TO COLON CANCER, A DAILY LOW 
20101207024708.500|20101207024711.000|CCO|DOSE OF ASPIRIN REDUCED THE 
20101207024711.000|20101207024712.429|CCO|DEATH RATE FROM ES SOF GUS, 
20101207024712.429|20101207024713.857|CCO|STOMACH, LUNG AND PROSTATE 
20101207024713.857|20101207024715.286|CCO|CANCERS AND THEY
20101207024715.286|20101207024716.714|CCO|HYPOTHESIZED THAT TAKING ASPIRIN
20101207024716.714|20101207024718.143|CCO|DAILY COULD REDUCE THE OVERALL 
20101207024718.143|20101207024719.571|CCO|CANCER DEATH RATE BY AS MUCH AS 
20101207024719.571|20101207024721.000|CCO|30% OVER A 20-YEAR PERIOD.
20101207024721.000|20101207024726.000|CCO|>> WE KNOW THAT CHRONIC 
20101207024726.000|20101207024731.000|CCO|INFLAMMATION CAN LEAD TO CANCER.
20101207024731.000|20101207024732.250|CCO|SO IT MAKES SENSE THAT ASPIRIN 
20101207024732.250|20101207024733.500|CCO|IS AN ANTIINFLAMMATORY.
20101207024733.500|20101207024734.750|CCO|>> Reporter: THERE ARE TWO 
20101207024734.750|20101207024736.000|CCO|REASONS FOR CAUTION ABOUT THIS 
20101207024736.000|20101207024737.250|CCO|STUDY.
20101207024737.250|20101207024738.500|CCO|IN SOME PEOPLE, REGULAR ASPIRIN 
20101207024738.500|20101207024739.750|CCO|USE LEADS TO STOMACH BLEEDING.
20101207024739.750|20101207024741.000|CCO|A SERIOUS SIDE EFFECT.

20101207024743.000|20101207024745.000|CCO|ANALYSIS OF OTHER STUDIES.

20101207024749.000|20101207024751.000|CCO|ACCEPTED.
